message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I think this is a great price considering the value it brings, and I'm confident you'll love it.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm currently looking to stay within a budget of $10000. Would you be able to consider this price point?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value the product brings.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I'm still looking to keep my spending within $10000. Would it be possible to negotiate further?

I understand your desire to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to make a slightly larger concession and offer it to you for $10800. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value the product brings.
Thank you for your continued efforts, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a final offer of $10500.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $10500. I'm willing to make one final concession and offer it to you for $11200. I think this is the best compromise we can reach, considering the value the product brings.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to make a final offer of $10900.

I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10900. I'm willing to make one last attempt to reach a compromise and offer it to you for $11400. I think this is the best we can do, considering the value the product brings.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering our previous negotiations, I believe a fair price for the product would be $11000.
